name: Untouched - A Dragon Age Fangame
description:
A short visual novel set in Bioware's Dragon Age: Inquisition universe. Includes characters native to the franchise as well as an original character. The plot and script are derived from an original quest design document created as part of a Bioware writing sample. 

Developed and edited in Ren'Py. Assets created in Adobe Photoshop and Paint Tool Sai.
